comment:
* Special private access for certain globals related to a process.
 * @hide

methods.name: public static Application getInitialApplication()
methods.comment:
* Return the first Application object made in the process.
     * NOTE: Only works on the main thread.

methods.name: public static String getInitialPackage()
methods.comment:
* Return the package name of the first .apk loaded into the process.
     * NOTE: Only works on the main thread.

methods.name: public static IPackageManager getPackageManager()
methods.comment:
* Return the raw interface to the package manager.
     * @return The package manager.

methods.name: public static IPermissionManager getPermissionManager()
methods.comment:
* Return the raw interface to the permission manager.
     * @return The permission manager.

methods.name: public static int getIntCoreSetting(String key, int defaultValue)
methods.comment:
* Gets the value of an integer core setting.
     *
     * @param key The setting key.
     * @param defaultValue The setting default value.
     * @return The core settings.

methods.name: public static float getFloatCoreSetting(String key, float defaultValue)
methods.comment:
* Gets the value of a float core setting.
     *
     * @param key The setting key.
     * @param defaultValue The setting default value.
     * @return The core settings.

methodNames: public static int getIntCoreSetting(String key, int defaultValue)
public static float getFloatCoreSetting(String key, float defaultValue)
